versions.release_notes: Critical bug fix.
UPI now available in the Login Section exclusively for HDFC Bank Customers.
UPI (Unified Payment Interface) is now enable in MobileBanking App. Now you can Pay & Collect funds just by using Virtual Payment Address.
UPI (Unified Payment Interface) is now enable in MobileBanking App. Now you can Pay & Collect funds just by using Virtual Payment Address.

Revamp of Non-logged in section of our HDFC Mobile Banking App for better customer experience.

Improvements & Bug fixes in the App.

Quick Mobile Biller Addition
Instant PIN generation. Now you can generate your HDFC Bank Debit Card PIN instantly through HDFC Bank Mobile App.
Login into Mobile banking > select Debit Card tab > Select Instant PIN Generation > Enter your new PIN.
This option is only for Active card.

- Instant PIN Generation. Now you can generate your HDFC Bank Credit Card PIN instantly through HDFC Bank Mobile App.

Login into Mobile Banking > Select Credit Card Tab > Select Instant PIN under Request Tab > Enter your New PIN.

This option is only for Primary Card Holders.
- Critical Bug Fixes.
- Quick Access PIN process has been modified.
- Now Pre-Qualified customers can apply for a Credit Card in a Straight through process
- Few Bug Fixes

- Now get exciting offers post login on your MobileBanking App.
- Bug fixes and enhancements
- mPassbook Bug Fixes

- Introducing mPassbook- View passbook on your mobile phone! get regular transaction updates of your Savings & Current A/c, RD or FD Summary

Features:

· Tag transactions & add personalized notes
· Search & filter transactions
· Offline mode Access-Update till last Sync
· Interactive statement-Categorize transactions & see break up of your income/expense transactions

Available for Android OS 2.3 & above. Coming soon for iOS & Windows

- Critical bug fixes & Enhancement

- Now experience a convenient face-to-face conversation with your Virtual Relationship Manager. A 'by invitation' only service through VideoBanking.
- Few bug fixes done.

- Now access Vroom Wheelz app directly from your HDFC Bank MobileBanking App
- Now access Secure Banking tips from your HDFC Bank MobileBanking App
- Critical bug fixes

- Now purchase new forex card and reload your existing forex card from your MobileBanking App
- Critical bug fixes & enhancements

- Now purchase new forex card and reload your existing forex card from your MobileBanking App
- Now update aadhar card from your MobileBanking App
- Critical bug fixes & enhancements

- Now access Chillr app directly from your HDFC Bank MobileBanking App
Get exciting offers through SmartBuy

- Now access HDFC Bank PayZapp and HDFC Bank Hindi app directly from your HDFC Bank MobileBanking App.
- Apply for NRI account
- Bug fixes & Performance Improvements

- Now access HDFC Securities Ltd (HSL) app and HDFC AAG (At A Glance) app directly from your HDFC Bank MobileBanking App
- Apply for NRI account
- Bug fixes & Performance Improvements

- Performance improvement and bug fixes
-Our App will now notify you of various events like salary credits, bill payments and a whole lot more! Through our unique 'action' button on each notification, you will be able to act on them immediately and pay bills, view balances etc. with the convenience of HDFC Bank Mobile Banking.

store_info.title: HDFC Bank MobileBanking
store_info.description:
HDFC Bank MobileBanking

The official app of HDFC Bank for Android.

HDFC Bank MobileBanking gives you access to your account on your Android phone. Now, you can perform your banking tasks from the palm of your hand, from anywhere and at anytime!


What can you do?
- Pay utility bills, credit card bills, etc.
- View Account summaries and Fixed Deposit summaries
- Transfer funds ,including transfers to other bank customers
- Request statements, cheque book, stop payment
And much, much more.
store_info.short_description:
HDFC Bank MobileBanking

The official app of HDFC Bank for Android.

Seems that recent updates made it worst. Please improve.

reviews.title: Serious security issue in UPI tab
reviews.body: I have saved my login info and I log into app through pin. When u click on UPI on home screen which appears when u open the app. It gives a prompt but directly land to UPI section where you can do transaction without even being logged in. This is very serious security lapse. If someone lost his phone, UPI transaction will be possible without entering any pin.

reviews.body: I have recently upgraded my SIM card from 3G to 4G service while the mobile number remains same as originally registered. Ever since then I'm unable to use the UPI function. After logging in with customer ID details, it shows a message of SIM change, if I select Yes: I get a message of successful registration, but can't use the UPI function. If I select No: the application hangs up. Tried calling phone banking, but the executive was clueless about the query. Kindly help

reviews.title: Even school kids develop better applications
reviews.body: Had already using this bank from last 2 years, among all the online banking applications i have used, I find HDFC and Union Bank to be the worst, much more worst when it comes to being user friendly. If something goes wrong by the application itself , you cannot log on till the time HDFCs useless application server finds it OK. The application , especially pathetic, when you want to transfer funds, it will keep on rolling round and round and round till the time your session is logged out. I insist every use

reviews.body: In UPI when ever i click on pay , it always show me validation failed message. In USSD whenever i try to know my MMID no. it give me message that mobile no. not registered whereas my no. is registered with my account.

reviews.title: Worst app
reviews.body: Worst APP since this app is not useful for Credit card holders without Hdfc account. Other banks providing same. Hdfc is not technically UpTo date.
No provision for forgot password in the app... HDFC wants you to find a laptop to open the website only from internet explorer if u forgot ur password.. pathetic app..pathetic customer service

reviews.title: Bug in app
reviews.body: While trying to send money through UPI, it is giving error "unable to connect server". Then in txn history it showed those payment attempts as success. After sometime it showed their status as failed.

reviews.title: Doubt regarding UPI
reviews.body: Hello I have activated my UPI. The interface is good and good thing is that there are multiple options to pay viz. UPI address, ifsc code, mobile mmid. TherE is also an option to pay via aadhar number however there is one column which says IIN. What is this IIN? I tried to google it but could not find anything. Please let me know what is This IIN??

reviews.title: Login
reviews.body: Provided quick access pin login in hdfc mobile app, its really good. But now due to using quick access ping every time for last 1 month, I forgot my ipin. So it will be better if quick access can be provided in web login as well.

reviews.title: No option for adding new beneficiary account
reviews.body: Guys..all other banks giving option to add new beneficiary from mobile app .Think from user point of view every time user don't go website to add new beneficiary learn yourself and update it ASAP.

I am having dual SIM mobile. When I opened the UPI interface for the first time a message was sent from my mobile no which is not registered with the bank. after that I am not able to register for UPI. I tried even by placing the registered mobile number in the primary slot. Every time I try to register for UPI i am getting the error "The mobile no is not registered". There is no way to register again with the valid mobile number.

reviews.title: Is service down?
reviews.body: Unable to reach server, please try later messages is all I get.

reviews.title: Serious errors.
reviews.body: Don't depend on the balances displayed thru this app. It has serious errors. The holdings in the demat account for MFs is incorrect. Even multiple mails to the MD have failed to wake them up. Stay away.

reviews.title: Needs fix for orientation
reviews.body: If orientation is changed while logged in, it forces the app to close, session is terminated unexpectedly, but use is not allowed to continue for some more time.

reviews.body: Extremely helpful. No need to have hard copy of Passbook, to go to branch and wait for hours to get ur activities done.....etc. I strongly recommend to install this App and be tension free,  save time, safe, secure and have your bank in your hand.
Excellent

reviews.title: Sagar Dhatrak
reviews.body: Very good app

Cannot use UPI, If I remove my sim from phone, or use different sim number, without allowing app to register my new number again in UPI.

reviews.title: Fund transfer concerns
reviews.body: I face continuous trouble to transfer money to other accounts which is making me feel ridiculous.  Even the bank employee asked me to update the app. But it's not working. Kindly see to it.

reviews.title: Worst app ever
reviews.body: I am not able to  enter my customer ID which have only alphabets. This app is only allowing you to enter numeric values. This way I will have to reset my customer id to numeric values

reviews.title: Huge security breach with UPI !!
reviews.body: After I sign up for UPI, it logs me in every time I click on UPI button from the login page. This happens even if I have logged out from the UPI logout button. It also allows me to transfer amount!! How can you release such an app without such validations??? I have uninstalled this app as it was logging into my UPI details even if I had logged out of everywhere. If you want details I can share the video with you as well..

reviews.title: OK
reviews.body: The app has a problem of recognizing the login pin. If the handset has been changed, it mentions "You are already registered on another device". This problem has been existing since last 3 months and no bug fixes dive for the same. Hope to receive a response from the developer.

reviews.title: Frustrating after latest update
reviews.body: After logging in, I can't see my account balance. It says check Internet connection. I can see credit card or demat balance.

reviews.title: Problem with UPI
reviews.body: The UPI option provided for in the HDFC Bank app is not functional. I have registered the VPA but cannot generate the MPIN. Moreover if you select the pay option it is giving an error "validation failed". In this age where the govt is pushing for digital payments I am disappointed with the way the app is functioning especially the new way of digital payments.

reviews.title: Incorrect info displayed
reviews.body: In my credit card selection dropdown... i am seeing a card no which i dnt have... and all my transactions wid the card i have are shown under that card... please solve this issue at the earliest...

reviews.title: Bluddy service
reviews.body: I dono wat service r giving to customer....from HDFC bank check to Hdfc account it's take around 2days to clear....in case of emergency need money wat to do haaaa....worst service they r providing n also applied for check book it's shows delivered to my address but I didn't get dat check also...
Good
Best
Good
Lovely

reviews.title: Authentication Failed
reviews.body: I have set my mpin but while performing transaction and providing my mpin it shows error as fingerprint mismatch. My device has fingerprint scanner but I use it for unlockong the phone. If I have set mpin it should accept the same but its not happening after entering mpin too. This problem occured today when I am writing this. Few days back I was able to perform two transactions using sane mpin. Please resolve the issue.

reviews.title: Very uncomfortable
reviews.body: Team hdfc for s b account y sage it's well n fine but in the same app if we link a credit card we can't use the card in app and can't get the cc statements also in this case I give full kudos to Kotak mahindra bank app for example I would recommend you also check once and I wish you guys would slove this glitch in you app ....thank you

reviews.title: Branch Locator Issue
reviews.body: It doesn't fetch location exactly, unable to locate the branch and ATM in my area. Need to improve the GPS tracking functionality. Otherwise banking functions are good.

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.body: Gets everything done. No complaints here apart from the rare crash(very rare) , update: been 2 years . And still things perfect. Crashed have disappeared.

reviews.title: UPI
reviews.body: Everytime it says Validation failed whenever i try UPI for transactions. Other features are working fine. I went to branch to get some help they told me to download chillr.

I am not able to use this app as asking for some question and answer on home page.Earlier it was working perfectly.Suddenly,I dont know what happended? Callcenter number is not reachable at all inspite of umteen numbers of trials.When I visited Branch Office,They would start to sell their Bogus schemes instead of helping poor customer.  Dont know what to do....Pls help,if developer team can:(

reviews.title: Quick access pin not working after latest update
reviews.body: Always gives error "You are already registered with some other device" when I try to login using Quick access pin, after latest update. Please fix it.

reviews.title: Worst
reviews.body: Worst service providers ever saw. Worst merchant service providers.      My complain no. 6553915 .  Kindly see to it

reviews.title: Grate
reviews.body: Love

reviews.title: Personalized User ID
reviews.body: Please support personalized net banking user id.

reviews.title: Bug
reviews.body: I am already registered for quick access but it say you are not registered . Even when I again try to register it alerts that I don't have a quick access setup

After updating APP,  unable to Click on UPI,  since APP crashes and refreshes to 1st screen everytime i click on UPI. I am using LG G2 LTE mobile. After clicking on UPI i had 0.1 sec to click "accept". Kindly help

reviews.title: UPI Issue - Unable to create mpin with Maestro card
reviews.body: I am unable to create mpin and transact with upi of my SBI account. The debit card linked to account is old Maestro card and it has only valid from date. There is no valid from date. Please add feature to transact with OTP and skip valid till date for Maestro cards

reviews.title: Doesn't allow transfer of funds
reviews.body: Whenever I try to add beneficiary (HDFC or any other account), it tells me "Application transfer not allowed". Whereas I have seen my friends using fund transfer from their phones effortlessly. Fund transfer was one of the main reasons I downloaded the app.

reviews.title: TP fund transfer issue
reviews.body: The active session is getting terminated, if we minimize the app to get the OTP from messaging app. Is there way to directly fetch the otp from messaging app or to keep the current session active even though if we minimize the app?

reviews.title: Crash issue during payment
reviews.body: After the recent update i am having app crash issue, while i am trying to payment by NEFT or IMPS after selecting beneficiary and filling the detail the app always crased automatically. Please fix it.

reviews.title: Unable to make UPI transactions
reviews.body: While trying to make payments using UPI for the 1st time ever I am getting error as "You have exceeded the permissible amount for UPI transaction."

reviews.title: Doesn't let me use the pin after changing device
reviews.body: Doesn't let me use the pin after changing device. Should have given the option to verify my new device.! #Fail

reviews.title: Hdfc app
reviews.body: Easy service good enjoying it.

reviews.title: Upi is working?
reviews.body: Hello bank team  if I do transaction through this.,, am I eligible for lucky Grahak Yojana??

reviews.title: Not working
reviews.body: I want to show my account statement but some technical problems occur

reviews.title: Ya
reviews.body: Ex Lent

reviews.title: It's good
reviews.body: User friendly

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.body: Best and simple

reviews.title: Very Poor response
reviews.body: I am trying to update my new mobile number in my Creditcard since 35 days. But everytime they are rejecting due to signature mismatch. Really nonsense. Atlast decided to close the account

reviews.title: UPI ISSUE. please resolve Admin
reviews.body: Can't add SBI account in UPI module. Since SBI debit cards have validity upto 2040 and the option to select in hdfc UPI app is upto 2028. Silly error but please rectify ASAP

reviews.title: Problem in UPI section
reviews.body: Whenever I click UPI after login, a message appears---sim has changed do you want to update.After clicking OK Validation failed message appears.Resolve the issues. other HDFC section work

reviews.title: Not able to transfer fund
reviews.body: I had download successfully the app. And login but when I click to any other options it give an error " Application transection not allowed" what should I do.???

reviews.title: UPI force stop
reviews.body: The wrost experience i have with this app.  First in upi my money is deducted but not credited to the beneficiary so my two transactions are not done and payment deducted too. After that when i click on the UPI it will force fully shut down.  Kindly refund my money. Hope for the reply.

reviews.title: Problem with ad popup
reviews.body: Due to ad pop-up, not able to view statement. It blocks the screen functionality. Will be good if rectified

reviews.title: Good but still a lot of scope for improvement
reviews.body: I shared some suggestions through mail but by reading the replies i got it seems you are not interested in suggestions

reviews.title: Quick access not working
reviews.body: When devices get formatted quick access pin not working.bank person has no proper training given to resolve the problem.

reviews.title: BUGGY UPI interface
reviews.body: Too many bugs. Always get that unable to process error.

reviews.title: How to RE-register upi
reviews.body: I reset my phone now I am again trying to establish upi account it show me error Evey time plz do something about it I have bank register mobile no. And jio sim in mobile plz make some improvement to make it easy

reviews.title: Update for quick login
reviews.body: When we will expect update app for quick login..??? . Facing problem after changing my mobile.
